CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(Activation_line__r.First_name__c), ISBLANK(Activation_line__r.Last_name__c) ), Activation_line__r.Email__c, IF( ISBLANK(Activation_line__r.Email__c), Activation_line__r.First_name__c + ' ' + Activation_line__r.Last_name__c, Activation_line__r.First_name__c + ' ' + Activation_line__r.Last_name__c + ', ' + Activation_line__r.Email__c ) )
CustomField.label: Phone Number User
